alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chase; Greenwood; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 10:00AM CDT until July 17 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Chase County in east central Kansas... Northeastern Butler County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Marion County in central Kansas... Northwestern Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 1000 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Florence, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Peabody, Florence, Burns, Rosalia, Cassoday, Matfield Green, Cedar Point, El Dorado Lake, El Dorado State Park, Thrall and Wonsevu. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 74 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
